price: Basi kumbusha! Kwani wewe, kwa neema ya Mola wako Mlezi, si kuhani wala mwendawazimu.
arabic: فَذَكِّرۡ فَمَآ أَنتَ بِنِعۡمَتِ رَبِّكَ بِكَاهِنٖ وَلَا مَجۡنُونٍ
footnotes: Wewe endelea na kukumbusha kama unavyo fanya. Kwani wewe, kwa neema ya Mwenyezi Mungu aliyo kuneemesha kukupa Unabii na akili iliyo timia, si kuhani anaye toa khabari za ghaibu bila ya ilimu, wala si mwendawazimu unaye sema usiyo yasadiki.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: fadhakkir famā anta biniʿ'mati rabbika bikāhinin walā majnūnin
